name: Wake Up
description: Experience a shattered and surreal dream filled with fascinating riddles, where your only guide is an elusive butterfly. Can you make the journey and wake up?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 & AMD 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970, AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 4790 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce® GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11

reviews.review_text: Interesting puzzles, neat aesthetics, and really awesome sound.  And it's free, so if you have VR, check it out!
Fantastic little experience. I would defintely have paid a dollar or two to play. I hope to see a more robust experience by this team in the future!

Interesting and well put together experience.  The puzzles could have been a bit more consistantly presented some felt like random trial and error and other seemed too obvious.  For free, recommended.

Wake Up  is a short, first-person puzzle game for the Vive.  The player explores a set of areas, using only (sometimes  extremely  subtle) environmental cues to determine how to manipulate her surroundings in order to progress.  The puzzles were interesting and fairly unique - definitely a worthwhile use of a half hour.
